title: The Nighting Trendgeist 6/1: David McAtee, Virgil Abloh, White House,
itunes:title: The Nighting Trendgeist 6/1: David McAtee, Virgil Abloh, White House,
description:
On this edition of The Nighting Trendgeist Jack and Miles discuss David McAtee being killed by the National Guard last night, Virgil is getting backlash on Social Media for his takes on looting around the country (and also donating the bare minimum to relief efforts), and protests are continuing outside the White House.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
